bibl.title: The Empedoclean KÒsmow: Structure, Process and the Question of Cyclicity. Proceedings of the Symposium Philosophiae Antiquae Tertium Myconense. July 6th - July 13th, 2003. Part I: Papers. (Institute for Philosophical Research. Conference Series. 3.) <kosmos>

PIERRIS Apostolos L. (Ed.), The Empedoclean KÒsmow: Structure, Process and the Question of Cyclicity. Proceedings of the Symposium Philosophiae Antiquae Tertium Myconense. July 6th - July 13th, 2003. Part I: Papers. (Institute for Philosophical Research. Conference Series. 3.) <kosmos>
